basics.name: Caio Ignatz Martins
basics.label: Dare to develop solutions through technology
basics.summary: Striving for excellence as software developer using mostly open source resources to serve organization with the best of my technical skills and abilities.

work.company: Digesto Pesquisa e Banco de Dados

work.summary:
Opportunity to work with and mentored by a data solution engineer Lead/Architect. Together, we transform and turn data into actionable insights for educational stakeholders in Brazil.

- Creation and optimization of new or existing ETL processes with Apache Airflow
- Promote the role and capabilities of IT regarding data & analytics
- Work with Data Warehousing and BI applications
- Engage with Sincroniza Team to build and deliver analytics reports
- Management of automated email solutions, such as Amazon SES and Mailchimp API
- Creation of custom software components on demand
- Creation of an automated workflow for backing up Google Drive to a cold cloud storage service using Rclone

Our Stack: Python3.x, App Script, Jinja2, RClone, Amazon Web Services(S3 and SES), Google Cloud Platform, Google G Suite and Linux.

Help solve company challenges using Machine Learning and Software Engineering approaches to support tasks like classification and forecasting. 

- Creation of custom software components on demand
- Involved in unit and Integration testing process
- Experience with RDBMS and NO-SQL Databases, like Cassandra, MongoDB, MySQL and its drivers for Python
- Contribute to internal Wiki
- Performed research regarding Python Programming and its uses and efficiency

education.gpa: School of Arts, Sciences and Humanities (EACH-USP)
